data.name: CMD_Open_in_Application_Label
data.comment: A command that opens the selected file(s) in the application.

data.name: CMD_Open_in_Application_Label_TT
data.value: Open the selected file in the application.
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that opens the selected file(s) in the application.

data.name: CMD_Open_in_Windows_Label
data.comment: A command that is applied to a folder and displays the Windows Explorer with the selected folder.

data.name: CMD_Open_in_Windows_Label_TT
data.value: Displays the Windows Explorer with the selected folder.
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that is applied to a folder and displays the Windows Explorer with the selected folder.

data.name: CMD_Copy_Path_To_Clipboard_Label
data.comment: A command that is applied to a folder and copies its path into the Windows clipboard.

data.name: CMD_Copy_Path_To_Clipboard_Label_TT
data.value: Copy as path into Windows clipboard.
data.comment: A tool tip for a command that is applied to a folder and copies its path into the Windows clipboard.

data.name: CMD_Open_with_Windows_Association_Label
data.comment: A command that executes the selected item (folder or file) with default Windows application.

data.name: CMD_Open_with_Windows_Association_Label_TT
data.value: Execute the selected item (folder or file) with default Windows application.
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that executes the selected item (folder or file) with the default Windows application.

data.name: CMD_ToggleIsFolderVisibleCommand_TT
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that toggles between show or hide folder in list.

data.name: CMD_ToggleIsIconVisibleCommand_TT
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that toggles between show or hide icons in list.

data.name: ToggleIsHiddenVisibleCommand_TT
data.value: Show or hide hidden files and folders.
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that toggles between show or hide hidden files and folders.

data.name: SelectLocationCommand_TT
data.value: Select a location to navigate to it.
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that can browse to a selected folder.

data.name: SelectFilterCommand_TT
data.value: Select a filter to restrict the listed files.
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that can apply a filter on a list of files.

data.name: NavigateBackCommand_TT
data.comment: A tool tip for command that navigates to a previous location.

data.name: NavigateForwardCommand_TT
data.comment: A tool tip for command that navigates forward to a previously visited location.

data.name: NavigateUpCommand_TT
data.comment: A tool tip for command that navigates to a parent (folder) of the current folder.

data.name: RefreshCommand_TT
data.comment: A tool tip for command that updates the currently listed items.

data.name: FolderItem_Desktop
data.comment: A special Windows folder

data.name: FolderItem_MyDocuments
data.comment: A special Windows folder

data.name: STR_MSG_DIRECTORY_DOES_NOT_EXIST
data.value: The directory '{0}' does not exist or cannot be accessed.

data.name: CMD_RecentFolderAdd_TT
data.value: Adds the selected folder to the list of recent folders.

data.name: CMD_RecentFolderRemove_TT
data.value: Removes the selected folder from the list of recent folders.

data.name: ToggleIsFilteredCommand_TT
data.value: Apply or remove the currently configured filter
data.comment: A tool tip string for a command that toggles between showing or hiding a filter application on files and folders.
